thread.section_title: Keep&Share Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keep&Share | keepandshare.com
thread.title: Craig G Clark
thread.title_full: Keep&Share reviewed by Craig G Clark

author: Craig G Clark
title: Craig G Clark
text: These calendars are my 'go to' daily, weekly and monthly schedule. If I were younger or saw better, I'd give them the highest marks. As it is, at 81 I NEED this service and it serves me well. I don't eve need to use the reminders, I just go to the two-week consolidation and, at a glance, know what I've missed (joke). This is a really fine tool.
